reuze.awt

Class ib_FilterRipple

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.software.reuze.ib_a_Ops
      • com.software.reuze.ib_a_FilterTransform
        • reuze.awt.ib_FilterRipple
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    z_BufferedImageOp

    public class ib_FilterRipple
extends ib_a_FilterTransform
    A filter which distorts an image by rippling it in the X or Y directions. The amplitude and wavelength of rippling can be specified as well as whether pixels going off the edges are wrapped or not.
